column5: Peggy made it in today's paper too.
Thats awesome Dave thx so much for posting, when Peg gets home , having posted this for her will put a smile on her face for sure  thx bud
Cool..hard work can pay off in so many ways

Thats awesome Dave thx so much for posting, when Peg gets home , having posted this for her will put a smile on her face for sure  thx bud  Congrats to wifey John. With so many bikes being wasted it would be an opportunity for some enterprising young lad to assemble whole bikes for sale as a part time job. Or they could be donated to the poor as a community program. Now if you can get those greeks growing fast enough with your sunshine hours you can make the paper too for growing the biggest tomato in YK history.  Cheers
